医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
耶鲁大学科学家发现可缓解骨关节炎关节退化的药物靶点耶鲁大学的研究人员已经确定了一种药物靶标，可以减轻与骨关节炎相关的关节退化，骨关节炎是一种使人衰弱的疾病，仅在美国就有多达 3000 万人受到影响，他们于 1 月 3 日在《自然》杂志上报道了这一情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Yale-scientists-identify-drug-target-that-may-alleviate-joint-degenesis-in-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Yale-scientists-identify-drug-target-that-may-alleviate-joint-degenesis-in-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e82ad503-e533-406b-ad0f-960c605418bf Wed, 03 Jan 2024 13:13:46 -0500 Yale scientists identify drug target that may alleviate joint degeneration in osteoarthritis
大脑的免疫细胞可能是预防辐射暴露后认知缺陷的关键目标罗彻斯特大学德尔蒙特神经科学研究所的研究人员发现，小胶质细胞（大脑的免疫细胞）可以在辐射暴露后引发认知缺陷，并且可能是预防这些症状的关键目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Brains-immune-cells-may-be-a-key-target-for-preventing-cognitive-deficits-after-radiation-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Brains-immune-cells-may-be-a-key-target-for-preventing-cognitive-deficits-after-radiation-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afa35171-d839-43c0-bf7e-1fd0adba6d07 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 13:03:43 -0500 Brain's immune cells may be a key target for preventing cognitive deficits after radiation exposure
拨款 490 万美元用于建立 EndO 试验联盟，以改善克罗恩病患者的生活克利夫兰诊所和西安大略大学已获得赫尔姆斯利慈善信托基金的 490 万美元拨款，用于建立一个联盟，为克罗恩病和永久性回肠造口患者开发临床试验结果工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/2449-million-grant-awarded-to-build-EndO-Trial-consortium-for-improving-the-lives-of-Crohns-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/2449-million-grant-awarded-to-build-EndO-Trial-consortium-for-improving-the-lives-of-Crohns-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9df64bc-14ce-491a-80da-ae6b4c3bb052 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 12:33:01 -0500 $4.9 million grant awarded to build EndO-trial consortium for improving the lives of Crohn's patients
研究现有β受体阻滞剂作为新型镰状细胞疗法通常用于治疗心脏问题、血管瘤、偏头痛和焦虑的β受体阻滞剂可能成为镰状细胞病患者的新疗法。印第安纳大学医学院克兰纳特心血管研究中心 (KCVRC) 医学副教授 Ankit A. Desai 医学博士领导的研究人员已获得美国国防部 300 万美元的资助，用于评估该药物的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Existing-beta-blocker-investigated-as-novel-sickle-cell-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Existing-beta-blocker-investigated-as-novel-sickle-cell-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4235d2e-05ac-4ac5-b01f-8384da826df7 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 12:24:02 -0500 Existing beta blocker investigated as novel sickle cell therapy
新的研究项目旨在寻找 2 型糖尿病和肥胖症的创新治疗途径弗吉尼亚理工大学的一个研究团队从美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家糖尿病、消化和肾脏疾病研究所获得了近 200 万美元的资助，用于探索治疗 2 型糖尿病和肥胖症的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-research-project-seeks-to-find-innovative-treatment-pathways-for-Type-2-diabetes-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-research-project-seeks-to-find-innovative-treatment-pathways-for-Type-2-diabetes-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=775041d8-3c51-44f0-9f76-8114295a75b2 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 12:15:15 -0500 New research project seeks to find innovative treatment pathways for Type 2 diabetes and obesity
绘制微小的角膜神经以解开眼部之谜如果你愿意的话，请考虑一下角膜——大多数人都不会这样做，除非他们遇到了问题。它是眼睛的透明前表面，通过聚焦进入的光线来实现视力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Mapping-tiny-corneal-nerves-to-untangle- eyes-mysteries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Mapping-tiny-corneal-nerves-to-untangle- eyes-mysteries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd1732c8-4771-4f19-83c4-5bb0fca89dfd Wed, 03 Jan 2024 12:06:19 -0500 Mapping tiny corneal nerves to untangle ocular mysteries
新型合成抗生素被发现比现有药物更有效对抗“超级细菌”一项新的研究表明，利物浦大学研究人员开发的一种新型合成抗生素比现有药物更能有效对抗 MRSA 等“超级细菌”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-synthetic-antibiotic-found-to-be-more- effective-than-builted-drugs-against-superbugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-synthetic-antibiotic-found-to-be-more-efficient-than-builted-drugs-against-superbugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f1943be-69d6-4502-a7ab-0825011a58e4 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 12:01:53 -0500 New synthetic antibiotic found to be more effective than established drugs against 'superbugs'
“基因优先评分”有望彻底改变药物开发由于需要更好的方法来确定药物开发目标的优先顺序，西奈山伊坎医学院领导开发了一种新颖的“遗传优先评分”（GPS），它将把各种类型的人类遗传数据整合到一个单一的数据中。易于解释的分数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Genetic-priority-score-promises-to-revolutionize-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Genetic-priority-score-promises-to-revolutionize-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac40d162-5285-4c4d-9668-a899e1244fb8 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 11:48:41 -0500 "Genetic priority score" promises to revolutionize drug development
Cytonemes：发育中的神经系统的“快速地铁”圣裘德儿童研究医院的科学家发现，细胞线（细胞上细长的毛发状突起）在神经发育过程中非常重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Cytonemes-The-express-subways-of-the-developing-nervous-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Cytonemes-The-express-subways-of-the-developing-nervous-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10242d93-1af4-4475-a23b-fe07b3ee18e7 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 11:17:22 -0500 Cytonemes: The "express subways" of the developing nervous system
研究人员发现微生物酶导致尿液变黄根据 2024 年 1 月 3 日发表在《自然微生物学》杂志上的一项新研究，马里兰大学和美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员已经确定了导致尿液呈黄色的微生物酶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Researchers-identify-microbial-enzyme-responsible-for-making-urine-yellow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Researchers-identify-microbial-enzyme-responsible-for-making-urine-yellow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96110bad-6b28-4612-a92f-3f95ad566f06 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 09:50:06 -0500 Researchers identify microbial enzyme responsible for making urine yellow
